en: And We did certainly create man
out of clay from an altered black mud.
And the jinn We created before
from scorching fire.
And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels,
"I will create a human being
"I will create a human being
out of clay from an altered black mud.
And when I have proportioned him
and breathed into him of My [created] soul,
then fall down to him in prostration."
So the angels prostrated -
all of them entirely,
Except Iblees;
he refused to be with those who prostrated.
[Allah] said, "O Iblees,

ar: مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
en: what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human

ar: خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
en: whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
[Allah] said, "Then depart from it,
for indeed, you are expelled.

ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
en: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
